data.name: Fear Therapy
data.detailed_description:
Warning: The game contains high level horror elements and sudden scares. We definitely do not recommend players with physical and psychological sensitivities to play this game.



Fear Therapy is a product of single developer.

Fear Therapy, is a multiplayer(1-5) and single player psychological horror game.Try to complete the quests and leave the horror house before it is too late! Satan getting angrier every second and nothing holding it back.

In this game, players need to find ritual items and kill the satan. When you enter the house, you get stuck inside and no way out except starting the ritual. The unique feature of this game is that everything is dynamic. From the master to the beginner, everyone will have the same experience.

Dynamic Game Experience:
-Items spawn on random locations all around the map on each game.
- Navigation is change every second real-time.
- Every horror factor has random time so events are mostly unexpected.
- Difficulty changes over time so there's no difficulty setting on Lobby.
You will encounter a different gaming experience each time you play.



Game Modes:
- Single player: Single player versus Artificial Intelligence.
- Cooperative Mode: Players versus Artificial Intelligence.
- Satan Mode: Players versus player who is controlling the Satan. Satan has 8 different skills to use on other players.

About the Game:
Fear Therapy is a theory that has long been researched by psychologists. The lack of sufficient data makes it difficult to prove this theory. Many people have done real-time experiments to prove this theory before, but they were too scared to complete the experiment and interrupted it.

The main subject of this theory is that, people start not to be afraid of the fear factors they encounter for the first time after a while.The result of most of the experimental studies is that,the subjects overcome the fear they are exposed to. But after a while this fear starts again. Subjects who are constantly exposed to this fear become numb. As another result of the study, subjects exposed to fear start out more courageously when exposed to fear again. We have tried to convey the content of this therapy to you as much as we can and we are glad to say that you will experience everything about this therapy.


The game is currently in early access. There may be minor errors in the game. You can report these errors to us via Discord. We are constantly working to provide an error-free game. Thank you for your understanding.

data.short_description: Fear Therapy, is a multiplayer(1-4) and single player psychological horror game.Try to complete the quests and leave the horror house before it is too late! Satan getting angrier every second and nothing holding it back.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Norwegian, Portuguese, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Greek, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

data.legal_notice: 'Fear Therapy' uses the Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere. Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 – 2021, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages. Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content, Jumpscares.
